com.google.android.filament.Colors.LinearColor

  • 使用Colors.LinearColor的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.google.android.filament  

    • com.google.android.filament中Colors.LinearColor的使用

      注释类型为Colors.LinearColor的com.google.android.filament中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static float[] Colors.cct(float temperature)
      Converts a correlated color temperature to a linear RGB color in sRGB space.
      static float[] Colors.illuminantD(float temperature)
      Converts a CIE standard illuminant series D to a linear RGB color in sRGB space.
      static float[] Colors.toLinear(Colors.Conversion conversion, float[] rgb)
      Converts an RGB color in sRGB space to an RGB color in linear space.
      static float[] Colors.toLinear(Colors.RgbaType type, float[] rgba)
      Converts an RGBA color to linear space, with pre-multiplied alpha.
      static float[] Colors.toLinear(Colors.RgbaType type, float r, float g, float b, float a)
      Converts an RGBA color to linear space, with pre-multiplied alpha.
      static float[] Colors.toLinear(Colors.RgbType type, float[] rgb)
      Converts an RGB color to linear space, the conversion depends on the specified type.
      static float[] Colors.toLinear(Colors.RgbType type, float r, float g, float b)
      Converts an RGB color to linear space, the conversion depends on the specified type.
